witness_summon.testimony_purpose: To address key facts related to a contract dispute between the plaintiff (John Doe) and defendant (Jane Smith), specifically regarding the signed agreement dated March 1, 2024, and any subsequent communications or meetings relevant to the dispute.
witness_summon.failure_consequences: Contempt of court, fines, or arrest.
